content: @Anatole Dedecker, are you sure about tagging this with modifies-tactic-syntax? This doesn't touch the user-facing interface, so tactic syntax is untouched.
In my understanding, this label should not merely be used for tactic PRs (we already have t-meta for this), but for tactic PRs that changes how tactics are invoked.
Oh yeah I just should have looked at what the PR was actually doing, sorry
